ActEmergency Preparedness Act
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCIES FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 71 - which authorizes the provision of financial assistance in regard to the damages caused by a severe snowstorm which hit Nova Scotia between February 18 and February 20, 2004.
